text: To Love () is a 1964 Swedish drama film written and directed by Jörn Donner. For her performance Harriet Andersson was awarded Volpi Cup for Best Actress at the 25th Venice International Film Festival. == Plot == == Cast == * Harriet Andersson as Louise * Zbigniew Cybulski as Fredrik * Isa Quensel as Märta * Thomas Svanfeldt as Jacob * Nils Eklund as Vicar * Jane Friedmann as Nora * Jan Erik Lindqvist as Speaker ==References== ==External links== * Category:1964 films Category:Swedish drama films Category:Swedish films Category:1964 drama films Category:Films directed by Jörn Donner
title: To Love (film)
